title: A Positive approach to the psychiatric patient
brief_description: Shows the treatment in Veterans Administration hospital for psychiatric patients who have emerged from acute episodes of mental illness but who are not yet well enough to leave the hospital. Uses a hospital ward unit as the focal setting, and stresses the roles of the nurse aide and physician.
